TITLE: Configuring Android Biometric Permissions
DESCRIPTION: Adds the required USE_BIOMETRIC permission to the Android manifest file to enable biometric authentication features.
SOURCE: https://github.com/freakyali/plugin.maui.biometric/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: XML
CODE:
```
<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.USE_BIOMETRIC" />
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring iOS FaceID Permissions
DESCRIPTION: Adds the required NSFaceIDUsageDescription key to the iOS Info.plist file to enable Face ID authentication with a custom usage description message.
SOURCE: https://github.com/freakyali/plugin.maui.biometric/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: XML
CODE:
```
<key>NSFaceIDUsageDescription</key>
<string>Need your face to unlock! </string>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Android Biometric Permission
DESCRIPTION: Required permission declaration in AndroidManifest.xml to enable biometric authentication on Android devices.
SOURCE: https://github.com/freakyali/plugin.maui.biometric/blob/master/Plugin.Maui.Biometric/Plugin.Maui.Biometric/readme.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: xml
CODE:
```
<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.USE_BIOMETRIC" />
```

TITLE: Configuring iOS FaceID Permission
DESCRIPTION: Required permission declaration in Info.plist to enable Face ID authentication on iOS devices with usage description.
SOURCE: https://github.com/freakyali/plugin.maui.biometric/blob/master/Plugin.Maui.Biometric/Plugin.Maui.Biometric/readme.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

TITLE: Loading MAUI App Assets using FileSystem in C#
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to access deployed raw assets using the FileSystem API from .NET MAUI Essentials. The code opens a file from the app package and reads its contents as text.
SOURCE: https://github.com/freakyali/plugin.maui.biometric/blob/master/Plugin.Maui.Biometric/Samples/Resources/Raw/AboutAssets.txt#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: csharp
CODE:
```
async Task LoadMauiAsset()
{
    using var stream = await FileSystem.OpenAppPackageFileAsync("AboutAssets.txt");
    using var reader = new StreamReader(stream);

    var contents = reader.ReadToEnd();
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining MauiAsset Build Action in CSPROJ for Raw Resources
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to include Raw resources in your MAUI project file to ensure they're deployed with the application package.
SOURCE: https://github.com/freakyali/plugin.maui.biometric/blob/master/Plugin.Maui.Biometric/Samples/Resources/Raw/AboutAssets.txt#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: xml
CODE:
```
<MauiAsset Include="Resources\Raw\**" LogicalName="%(RecursiveDir)%(Filename)%(Extension)" />
```
